2AEADEEB.Line7.A109C: It came to my village when I was young. (laugh) No better place to feed on misery than a small seaside village, hmm?

C4DF586D.Line9.A109C: It picks one person--spurned or envious--and promises them justice or vengeance. But it just brings more suffering. The wight feeds, grows strong, and the cycle continues.

F701EBE7.Line3.A109C: Anyone who's lived on the coast knows about it.
